ModMetaData.name: Childrens' Traits Affect Learning
ModMetaData.author: alite
ModMetaData.description:
This mod causes the too Smart, fast learning, and slow learning traits to affect children's learning rates. This was kept separate from my [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2976384929]genes affect learning rate mod[/url] because the effects do stack, which can make the effects much greater then some would like. For example, a child with the Slow Study Gene and the Slow Learner Trait only has a 12% learning rate factor.
